expo.name: Verbal Reasoning Tests
expo.description: Practise a timed reasoning test based on those used by employers.

intro.title: Welcome
intro.text: This will help you perform better in psychometric reasoning tests- the type most often used in job application processes.

intro.title: Work quickly
intro.text:
The tests are timed. It’s the time pressure that makes it difficult.

You should treat these practice tests like the real exam, and go back afterwards to review how you did.

intro.title: Improve your skills
intro.text: You’ll get your results at the end of the test and solutions to help you improve.
